description.en: Offer Akasha Dipam for this entire month, in the evening, on a high place (pillar?). Light lamps using gingelly oil with eight wicks.

shlokas:
tulAyAM  tilatailEna  sAyaGkAlE  samAgatE.
AkAzadIpaM  yO  dadyAnmAsamEkaM  hariM  prati.
mahatIM  zriyamApnOti  rUpa-saubhAgya-sampadam..

dAmOdarAya  nabhasi  tulAyAM  lOlayA  saha.
pradIpaM  tE  prayacchAmi  namO'nantAya  vEdhasE..
